name.ja: <ruby>深<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>淵<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>神<rt>じん</rt></ruby>アビス・ポセイドラ［<ruby>Ｌ<rt>エル</rt></ruby>］

requirement.en: If you have 5 or more Sea Serpent Type monsters in your Graveyard, place all monsters from your Graveyard on the bottom of the Deck in any order.

effect.en: Destroy 1 monster on your opponent's field. Then, if this card is in Maximum Mode and you shuffled 3 or more Maximum Monsters into the Deck to meet the requirement, you can destroy all cards on your opponent's field.
